    • Uses of ImageFunction in science.aist.imaging.api

      Classes in science.aist.imaging.api that implement ImageFunction 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  GenericImageFunction<I,​O,​I2,​O2>
      Generic image function that enables the interoperability between different ImageWrapper implementations
      Methods in science.aist.imaging.api that return ImageFunction 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default <X> ImageFunction<IN,​X> ImageFunction.andThen​(ImageFunction<OUT,​X> after)
      Chains multiple ImageFunctions.
      default ImageFunction<IN,​OUT> ImageFunction.andThenCloseInput()
      Closes the input image, after the apply function was executed
      default ImageFunction<IN,​OUT> ImageFunction.andThenConsumeInput​(Consumer<ImageWrapper<IN>> consumer)
      This function returns a function, that execute a given consumer after the apply function for the original function was called
      Methods in science.aist.imaging.api with parameters of type ImageFunction 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default <X> ImageFunction<IN,​X> ImageFunction.andThen​(ImageFunction<OUT,​X> after)
      Chains multiple ImageFunctions.
